text_block_list.text: I came to Tracen Academy a few days ago in order to train Uma Musume.
I also received a personal trainer's office, and as such I was looking over some files there…

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Fuee… This place is so nice… No one's here and it's quiet. Plus there's a soft and fluffy sofa there all for me!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: So I'll be helping myself to…

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Wait, who are you!? Why are you here!?
choice_data_list: I could ask you the same!
I could ask you the same!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: This empty Trainer's Office is Sei-chan's precious naptime spot. Wait…

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: That badge… could it be… are you a rookie trainer? And if so, did they tell you you could use this office?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Ah, okay. So that's what happened, got it!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Well anyways, I'll be borrowing that sofa over there. Today's class was real rough, and now I'm just so sleepy.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: So, I'll be taking a nap.
Without waiting for my response, this Uma Musume… Seiun Sky, lied down on the sofa and drifted off to sleep.
At any rate, I covered her with a blanket that I had in my office so she wouldn't catch a cold.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Fuwa… That was a great nap…

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Wait, who are you!?
choice_data_list: I told you I'm a trainer!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, I was just kidding. Thanks for the blanket though.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Also… Trainer-san? Why didn't you try and wake me up?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: I was obviously taking advantage of this empty room so that I could slack off in school. Then, I just fell asleep in front of you.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: I can't believe I'm saying this but, it'd be normal for you to kick me out saying something like "stop messing around," don't you think?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: So then why did you bring me a blanket and watch over me as I slept?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Ohoho… I get it now.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Yup, that's gotta be it! Well, thanks for today♪

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: I'll be sure to return this favor… if I remember it that is.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: So see ya later… and let's meet again, okay♪
As she said this, Seiun Sky left the room.
And a few days after that happened…

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Ah, there you are! Oi, you're the rookie trainer from before! This is bad, really really bad!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Things are really bad, so I'll tell you the details later, just answer me this!!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Are the two organs on either side of your chest that you use to breathe called lungs!?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: You're too quiet! Stop answering with a question and use your outside voice instead!!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Now say it one more time!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Now that's better! Just one more time now!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: So as I was saying Sensei, this person is my trainer!

text_block_list.name: Teacher A
text_block_list.text: I was wondering why you suddenly ran off… but I see, so they're your trainer.

text_block_list.name: Teacher A
text_block_list.text: So, Trainer-san. We are immensely appreciative of you for choosing Sky-san… We leave her in your care!!

text_block_list.name: Teacher A
text_block_list.text: Now then, Seiun Sky-san. I would like to congratulate you on finding a trainer.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, thank you, thank you. Alrighty then Sensei, see you later.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: And just like that!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: You and I are now trainer and Uma Musume. Come on, clap!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Oi, how scandalous. As they say, simply a means to an end, ya know?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: More importantly, I was kinda hoping you'd interpret what I did as me "doing this only because I wanted to work with you no matter what" or something like that.
choice_data_list: But why me of all people…?
But why me of all people…?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Eh? Do I really have to spell it out for you?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: It was love at first sight! Kyaha ☆

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: I'm just messing with you… But the truth is the way you acted the other day in the Trainer's Office really surprised me.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Plus this isn't a half bad arrangement for a rookie trainer like yourself!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Yup. After all… training me is super easy!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: I'm not looking for you to be super into your training or for you to make a special training regime or anything annoying like that.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Everything should be done in moderation after all. That's the philosophy Sei-chan lives her life by anyways.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: So… let's just relax and take this slow and comfortably… Oh!
I got swept along and ended up signing on as her trainer…!
And on the first day of training with Seiun Sky…
(Bzz, bzz)
I received a text, so I opened my phone to see the message, but…

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: "Trainer-san, I've got big news! I just saw a huge school of fish in the floodplains! It would be a disgrace for a master fisher such as myself to miss out on this!"

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: "P.S. I won't be at today's training. From Seiun Sky ☆"
She didn't even show up on the first day of training…
